  • endemo2.utility.utility.zip_data_on_x_and_map

endemo2.utility.utility.zip_data_on_x_and_map¶

zip_data_on_x_and_map(xys1, xys2, function)[source]¶

Combines two data lists and applies the given function to them. x-axis has to be ascending.

Parameters:

  • xys1 ([(float, float)]) – Data list one.

  • xys2 ([(float, float)]) – Data list two.

  • function – The function that is applied. Should be of form lambda x y1 y2 -> …

Returns:

The result of the applied function.
